Description: 2018 PRS Experience McCarty 594 Semi Hollow in like new condition. This guitar is basically brand new and has seen almost no play time. The tone, resonance and playability of this guitar is very special. She weighs a nice comfortable 7.4lbs and is very well balanced. Auction includes offers to buy now. Don't miss this limited guitar at this price. Cheapest you will find. Original HSC and case candy included. Free shipping in the US. International shipping will be added to sale price Description: Paul Reed Smith PRS 2018 Experience Ltd Run McCarty 594 Semi-Hollow Flame Top Rosewood Board McCarty Sunburst. The McCarty 594 is a vintage-inspired instrument that is at once incredibly familiar and effortlessly playable. Whether you are looking for rich, authentic, vintage humbucking tones or nuanced, sweet singlecoil sounds, the McCarty 594 can seamlessly master both sonic territories thanks to the 58/15 LT pickups and push/pull coil taps on the tone controls. The addition of an f-hole and semi-hollow body adds a breathy tone and rich resonance to this guitar, providing welcome depth and beauty. The electronics layout, a few key specifications, and PRS craftsmanship combine in the McCarty 594 to create an instrument that plays in tune, is intonated the entire length of the neck, and feels like a guitar that you’ve been playing forever. The McCarty 594 and Singlecut McCarty 594 Semi-Hollows make their debut at Experience PRS 2018.
Title: Paul Reed Smith 2018 Experience Limited Run McCarty 594 Semi Hollow
Subtitle: New Condition
